greetings.name: Greetings
greetings.description: Ways to say hello and greet people

entries.audioExample: A'ole way I going do dat!

english: doing something on purpose but making it look accidental
examples: He wen spill his drink accidentally on purpose to get her attention
entries.audioExample: He wen do dat accidentally on purpose, I know!

examples: No ack lidat in front aunty

Aiyah! I forgot my keys again
entries.audioExample: Aiyah, why you neva tell me?
You so akamai, can help me?

entries.usage: Universal Hawaiian greeting showing love and respect

entries.audioExample: Can wear slippahs fo aloha friday
And then wat you going do?

examples: Ass right, das how we do um

examples: I stay boro boroz after work
